chunks.zh: 买了个超级舒服的枕头。
chunks.en: Bought a super comfortable pillow.

chunks.zh:
在 1688 买了一个 40 块的枕头，是我用过最好的枕头，比我买的几个二三百的树脂枕头都要好。来源是在民宿用了一个特别舒适的枕头，翻到了标签中的厂商和电话，直接去找的，如果直接在购物网站搜索，是永远找不到这种类型的产品的。1688 里面，集中做某种产品的货源地的厂，慢慢找，总有好东西的

突然意外解决了没有舒适枕头的困扰，第一天就睡出了超级高的睡眠指数🤣
chunks.en:
Bought a 40 RMB pillow on 1688, it's the best pillow I've ever used, better than the resin pillows I bought for two or three hundred RMB. The origin of this search was that I used a particularly comfortable pillow in a homestay and found the manufacturer and phone number on the label, and went directly to them to buy , if you search directly on the shopping website, you will never find this type of product. In 1688, there are factories that concentrate on producing the source of goods for a certain product, slowly look for them, there's always good stuff.

Suddenly and unexpectedly solved the problem of not having a comfortable pillow, and the first day I slept with a super high sleep score 🤣

chunks.zh: 我现在睡荞麦枕，每天晚上给枕头一拳，砸个坑睡。
chunks.en: I sleep on a buckwheat pillow now, and every night I punch the pillow to make a dent to sleep in.

chunks.zh: 一心打广告的帖子，从一楼就开始锤。一心分享，坚决不打广告的楼主缺被大家追着要链接 hhhhhhh
chunks.en: A post single-mindedly advertising, being hammered from the first floor. A poster single-mindedly sharing, firmly not advertising, is being chased by everyone for a link hhhhhhh

chunks.zh: 现在软广都这样了么
chunks.en: Is this how soft ads are done now?

chunks.zh: @lonhongg #107 互联网本来就到处是软广，真假难辨，v 站的置顶机制也容易引发误会，如果适当质疑，后来发现是误会并道歉的行为，对你来说是红卫兵的话，那我只能说你很会戴高帽
chunks.en: @lonhongg #107 The internet is full of soft ads, and it is difficult to distinguish the truth from the fake. The V station's top placement mechanism can also easily cause misunderstandings. If you question it appropriately, and then realize that it is a misunderstanding and apologize, if that's 'Red Guard' behavior to you, then I can safely say that you're good at exaggerating.

chunks.zh: @xuxinglin8888 试了一段时间，说说效果吧。总体来说挺好，弹性足，柔软度也 ok. 个人觉得对于 33 元买这么一个枕头来说不亏。略微的不足是我感觉即使是高枕相对某些酒店的枕头还有点差距
chunks.en: @xuxinglin8888 Tried it for a while, let's talk about the effect. Overall it's pretty good, with enough elasticity and good softness. Personally, I don't think it's a loss to buy such a pillow for 33 yuan. The slight shortcoming is that I feel that even the high pillow is a bit different from some hotel pillows.

chunks.zh: 之前在宜家买了个舒服的枕头，300 左右，买到适合自己的枕头全靠运气
chunks.en: I bought a comfortable pillow at IKEA before, for about 300 RMB. It all depends on luck to buy a pillow that suits you.

chunks.zh: @marc2017 #20 想象了一下画面，太搞笑了🤣
chunks.en: @marc2017 #20 I imagined the scene, it's too funny🤣

chunks.zh: 成功勾引我去消费了 50
chunks.en: Successfully lured me to spend 50.

chunks.zh: @forest997 v 站有置顶这一说吗？？但是我确实没发过短时间这么火的帖子。
chunks.en: @forest997 Does V station have a top post feature?? But I really haven't posted a post that's become so popular in such a short time.

chunks.zh: 感受了一波流量的力量。
chunks.en: Felt the power of traffic.

chunks.zh: 怀疑软广的，我都注册了六七年了，第一次发枕头……但是就算是商业行为，也没什么，东西好就行。
chunks.en: Those who suspect it's a soft ad, I've been registered for six or seven years, and this is the first time I've posted about pillows... But even if it's a commercial activity, it's nothing, as long as the product is good.

chunks.zh: parallel desktop 还每年发帖挨骂呢，商业是社会活动的一部分。
chunks.en: Parallel Desktop still posts and gets scolded every year, business is part of social activity.

chunks.zh: 我没有逼任何人去买。。
chunks.en: I didn't force anyone to buy it.

chunks.zh: 说到床品，westin 和 ritz 的床是真的舒服，跟 5000 以下的床垫体验完全不一样，但是找厂家买也是一样贵 QAQ
chunks.en: Speaking of bedding, the beds at Westin and Ritz are really comfortable, the experience is completely different from mattresses under 5000, but buying from the manufacturer is just as expensive QAQ

chunks.zh: @gimp @q534 #56 那就是我误会了，不好意思
chunks.en: @gimp @q534 #56 Then I misunderstood, sorry.

chunks.zh: 估摸着店家该郁闷了，今天怎么这么多单个下单的用户，还是全国各地的那种
chunks.en: I guess the store owner must be depressed, why are there so many users placing single orders today, and from all over the country.

chunks.zh: @forest997 #49 有点红卫兵那味儿了
chunks.en: @forest997 #49 It's a bit 'Red Guard' in flavor.

chunks.zh: @949n9 #116 回来写测评了----买的中枕，按性价比来说应该是极高的，确实有种酒店枕头的感觉，蓬松度也够，睡得是挺舒服的，可以试试。（不过 33 块的东西也不要抱着太高的期待 -防杠）
chunks.en: @949n9 #116 Came back to write a review----Bought the medium pillow, in terms of cost performance it should be extremely high, it really has the feel of a hotel pillow, the fluffiness is enough, and it's quite comfortable to sleep on, you can try it. (But don't have too high expectations for something that costs 33 - anti-criticism)

chunks.zh: 留下关键词我看看
chunks.en: Leave the keywords so I can take a look.

chunks.zh: 你不说我怎么知道，告诉我我也买一个试试
chunks.en: How would I know if you don't tell me? Tell me so I can buy one and try it too.

chunks.zh: 求链接
chunks.en: Link please.

chunks.zh: @zhf883680 不能广告吧，厂子是南通的，从 1688 看，那边做枕头的非常多。
chunks.en: @zhf883680 Can't advertise, right? The factory is in Nantong. From 1688, there are many pillow factories there.

chunks.zh: 可以找找。
chunks.en: You can look for them.

chunks.zh: 这个很个人化，我是用到舒服的再找的，不一定适合你。
chunks.en: This is very personal. I found it after using a comfortable one, it may not suit you.

chunks.zh: @KookSpookk @kyrieou 看上面
chunks.en: @KookSpookk @kyrieou Look above.

chunks.zh: 来个链接或者关键词啊
chunks.en: Give us a link or keywords.
